ygData.subject: Re: About time
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, most Ogres and Trolls are furious about this, but I see it as a bug fix.  Any item that is limited to who can use it should be.  I really, really
ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Non Dark Elfs probably won't like this as much, but it looks as though the
> Guise is no longer dropping. There is a new mask dropping that gives the
> same effect but must be worn to be used. As a Dark Elf I love this change,
> it's nice to get some of my identity back..
>


Yeah, most Ogres and Trolls are furious about this, but I see it as
a bug fix. Any item that is limited to who can use it should be. I
really, really hated this item, as it made my choice of race pointless.
Ultravision and looking cool (IMO) were my rewards for being shunned
in 90% of the world, and at the same time having neither incredible
stats,
slam, or regen. Not to mention how much I hate Paladins with the guise
and an obsidian flamberge or razing sword looking exactly like me.

/cheer Verant

Xilith
